Articles.Content:
The challenge is to get a asteroid and stick wings on it yes you heard me your going to have to fly a asteroid.

Rules

No parachutes

VTOL landing is allowed

Has to be fly able

Engines are allowed

Must state what class of asteroid it is

Must have pictures for proof

Point system

100 points for flying a asteroid

100 points for landing

200 points for landing within 5 km of ksc

250 for landing on runway

300 points for landing with landing gear

50 points for every 1 km you fly

150 for no broken parts

500 points for being able to take of again

(edit) im still trying my self to do this. the best i have done is had it bounce across the top of the atmosphere and enter orbit again

Edited April 9, 2014 by Xplane
